name: happy-hour-lets-build-them-an-island
title: Happy Hour: Let’s Build Them An Island
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• As if anything else about the music industry needed to be exclusive, they can’t even be in the same nursing homes as the rest of us when they get old and senile. They’re building their own. [Tennessean]
  • In case you missed it earlier, Mario’s caught on fire. The restaurant had been empty since the last fire in 2006, so fortunately no one was hurt. Mario’s, which had been open since 1965 before closing up shop in 2006, was a favorite hangout for celebrities. Judging by the pictures, we’re not thinking there’s much of it left. [WKRN]
  • Falling behind on your child support payments? It may cost you your driver’s license, professional license, hunting license, fishing license, and everything-in-the-whole-world license. So pay up. [WTVF]
  • Wilson County, who earlier this year wasn’t quite sure how they were going to keep their schools in session, has reluctantly decided to raise property taxes. For the children or something. [WKRN]

Photo by library_chic.
